SearchModule.ModuleDescription: Extracts the line number of record matches search key 1 (xpath) in an XML file and outputs the search result

search for a class that is defined in the xml.
search the specified java files in the type attribute of the action tag of struts-config.xml, to specify the xpath as follows..
Search Keywords 1://*[local-name() = 'action-mappings']/*[local-name() = 'action']/@type
Search up to a semicolon as one chunk.

Get the method name for the interface defined in xml. Then, it searches for the place where the method is executed. To search for the interface specified by the ejb-jar.xml remote tag, specify xpath as the Search Keywords 1.
Search Keywords 1://session/remote

For a node matching the XPath of the first argument, search is performed as to whether the value of text matches the keyword of the second argument. To perform a search on all nodes, set search keyword 1 as follows. Search Keywords 1://* Search Keywords 2:SELECT.*FROM.*WHERE

Search API of java.
Specify the class name with FQCN as the first argument. For the second argument, define the name of the method you want to search, and search for the execution place of the method.
